text: Aigoneia (), also Aigone (Αἰγώνη), was a town in Malis in ancient Thessaly. It was mentioned by LycophronLycophron, 903. and Stephanus of Byzantium. Its site has not been located. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Malis (region) Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Aigoneia
